arts.ttl: Why Assistant Referee Burst Into Tears After RB Leipzig 2-3 Aston Villa
arts.sum: Alessandro Giallatini was seen being consoled by RB Leipzig manager Marco Rose as the full-time whistle sounded.

arts.ttl: Jhon Duran is outgrowing his nickname as Aston Villa close in on £9.4m boost
arts.sum: Villa's best performances this season have come in the Champions League, which bodes well for the final two matches against AS Monaco and Celtic, where Emery's side will have the chance to seal their place in the Champions League round of 16 and avoid a two-legged knockout play-off. It was a must-win game for Leipzig after losing their first five matches in the competition, but they were still Villa's pot one away opponents and are currently sitting in fourth position in the Bundesliga.

arts.ttl: Exclusive: Arsenal ready to rival Newcastle & Aston Villa for €40m attacker transfer
arts.sum: Arsenal are among the numerous clubs eyeing up a potential transfer deal for talented young Bologna forward Santiago Castro, CaughtOffside understands. We’ve previously reported on Arsenal’s interest in Castro, and it’s our understanding that the Gunners remain keen on the 20-year-old after scouting him in recent Serie A matches. As well as Arsenal, Castro also […] The post Exclusive: Arsenal ready to rival Newcastle & Aston Villa for €40m attacker transfer appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig 2-3 Aston Villa: Unai Emery's side condemn Die Roten Bullen to an unwanted Champions League first
arts.sum: Aston Villa's 3-2 win over RB Leipzig condemns the German club to an unwanted Champions League first, following their elimination from the competition.

arts.ttl: Why assistant referee burst into tears seconds after Aston Villa's win vs RB Leipzig
arts.sum: Assistant referee Alessandro Giallatini was spotted crying after the full-time whistle was blown following Aston Villa's 3-2 win against RB Leipzig in the Champions League on Tuesday

arts.ttl: Duran sends 'clear message' to Emery with Villa cracker
arts.sum: Jhon Duran continues to make his case to be Aston Villa's starting striker with a stunning strike in their 3-2 away win over RP Leipzig in the Champions League.

arts.ttl: Unai Emery hails 'serious' Aston Villa showing and confirms injury concern
arts.sum: "I try to enjoy and always we want to improve and sometimes it is hard but today the team were performing well, playing seriously and I was enjoying it," Emery told Amazon Prime. Unai Emery has hailed Jhon Duran's performance in Aston Villa's 3-2 win at RB Leipzig in the Champions League, but confirmed that the striker replaced Ollie Watkins due to a small injury.

arts.ttl: Villa's Champions League target now higher than at start - Emery
arts.sum: Aston Villa manager Unai Emery says the club's Champions League target is now higher than at the start of the competition after a thrilling 3-2 win in Leipzig.

arts.ttl: Unai Emery knows Champions League top-eight spot is possible for Aston Villa
arts.sum: Villa are third in the new league phase of the competition ahead of Wednesday’s games and with matches against Monaco and Celtic to come.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa Star's 'Great' Display vs RB Leipzig Gives Unai Emery a Problem
arts.sum: Uni Emery must act quickly to cling on to one of his brightest stars before they realise they will be valued elsewhere.
